pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import and Manipulate 'ForestGEO' Data // To help you access, transform, analyze, and visualize 'ForestGEO' data, we developed a collection of R packages (https://forestgeo.github.io/fgeo/). This package, in particular, helps you to easily import, filter, and modify 'ForestGEO' data. To learn more about 'ForestGEO' visit https://forestgeo.si.edu/.
